title: Undergraduate Main Stage Production: Design
description: A course that will guide a student in a design assignment on the undergraduate main stage production. Specialized topics dependent on the design requirements of the production. Students may repeat this course a maximum of six times or can receive up to twelve units, whichever is met first. A maximum of eight total units may be used towards major requirements. Prerequisites: TDDE 1 and TDDE 101 or TDDE 111 or TDDE 121 or TDDE 131, or consent of instructor. Instructor and department approval required.
